scripts.watch:run: cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/docker --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:ee: cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/docker --log-error --project tsconfig.ee.json" | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:ee-on-prem: cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/docker --log-error --project tsconfig.ee-on-prem.json" | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:ee-cloud: cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/docker --log-error --project tsconfig.ee-cloud.json" | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:mysql: cross-env  NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/dockerRunMysql --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:mysql:ee: cross-env  NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/dockerRunMysql --log-error --project tsconfig.ee.json"  | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:pg: cross-env  NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/dockerRunPG --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:pg:ee: cross-env  NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/dockerRunPG --log-error --project tsconfig.ee.json" | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:playwright:mysql: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cross-env NC_DB="mysql2://localhost:3306?u=root&p=password&d=pw_ncdb" PLAYWRIGHT_TEST=true NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/testDocker --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:playwright:pg: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cross-env NC_DB="pg://localhost:5432?u=postgres&p=password&d=pw_ncdb" PLAYWRIGHT_TEST=true NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/testDocker --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:playwright:pg:ee: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cross-env NODE_ENV=test NC_DB="pg://localhost:5432?u=postgres&p=password&d=pw_ncdb_meta" NC_DATA_DB="pg://localhost:5432?u=postgres&p=password&d=pw_ncdb_data" PLAYWRIGHT_TEST=true NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/ee/run/testDocker --log-error --project tsconfig.ee.json"  | pino-pretty
scripts.watch:run:playwright: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cross-env DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./test_noco.db PLAYWRIGHT_TEST=true NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true NC_SNAPSHOT_WINDOW_SEC=3 nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/testDocker --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:playwright:quick: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cp ../../tests/playwright/fixtures/noco_0_91_7.db ./test_noco.db; cross-env DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./test_noco.db NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/docker --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.watch:run:playwright:pg:cyquick: rm -f ./test_noco.db; cp ../../tests/playwright/fixtures/noco_0_91_7.db ./test_noco.db; cross-env NC_DISABLE_TELE=true EE=true nodemon -e ts,js -w ./src -x "ts-node src/run/dockerRunPG_CyQuick.ts --log-error --project tsconfig.json"
scripts.test:unit:pg: cp tests/unit/.pg.env tests/unit/.env; cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tests/unit/tsconfig.json mocha -r ts-node/register   tests/unit/index.test.ts --recursive --timeout 300000  --exit --delay
scripts.test:unit:pg:ee: cp tests/unit/.pg.env tests/unit/.env; cross-env EE=true NODE_ENV=test TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tests/unit/tsconfig.ee.json mocha -r ts-node/register   tests/unit/index.test.ts --recursive --timeout 300000  --exit --delay
